overview: A man discovers something unusual in a wheat field. Two strangers, Blue and Bordeaux, find themselves in a bunker. White makes its appearance and breaks the psycho-chromatic balances of the characters. Fear suddenly becomes hate, and the two end up fighting. The memories of a man travel in VHS and lacerate the clear images on the screen. Where they arrive, they upset. The three situations seem interconnected by an aleatory principle of cause-effect, the three characters by the same purpose.
tagline: WHAT HAPPENS IF YOU ISOLATE BLUE AND BORDEAUX?
title: NOTTI BIANCHE
